caption:
🌟 Exciting Live Event Alert! Dive into the Digital Transformation of Travel with Nikki Padilla Rivera! 🌟

Date: April 30, 2025
Time: 11am ET
Location: Live Online – Join Us from Anywhere!

Get ready for an electrifying live Q&A session with none other than Nikki Padilla Rivera, the trailblazing founder of Trip Kinetics and a fierce advocate for tour guides around the globe! This not-to-be-missed event is your chance to explore the critical role of technology in revolutionizing travel experiences. Nikki brings her rich expertise in tour design and global travel management to the table, ready to delve into how digital innovations enhance our journeys.

🚀 What's on the Agenda?
Nikki will unveil the cutting-edge technologies that fuel her enterprise and discuss how these tools are reshaping the way we think about travel. From advanced guide training systems to dynamic social media interactions, she will provide an insider’s view on integrating tech to make travel smarter, more engaging, and incredibly efficient.

🌐 Who Should Join?
This session is perfect for travel professionals eager to boost their business’s tech prowess, and technology aficionados curious about its profound impact on the tourism sector. Expect practical insights, forward-thinking strategies, and lively discussions.

🔗 Secure Your Spot!
Don’t let this unique opportunity slip by! Join us to discover how you can harness technology to not only enhance the travel experience but also to champion sustainability and inclusivity in tourism.

https://youli.io/t/production-team/ttcnikkipadilla?showrego=true

Prepare to be inspired, informed, and invigorated by Nikki's vision of a more connected and tech-savvy travel world. See you there!

Additional Information:
This interactive session is designed to be highly participative, with plenty of opportunities for Q&A and live demonstrations. Participants are encouraged to bring their questions and current design challenges to discuss during the workshop.
